news.content: Our paper "Traffic Accident Detection via Fusion-GRU based Future Frame Detection Box Prediction" has been accepted by IEEE ICC 2025. Congratulations Ziyuan!
We have two papers accepted by IEEE TrustCom 2025. Congratulations Tongxi and Spyridon!
Our paper "Towards Alarm Reduction in Intrusion Detection: A Recurrent Neural Network Approach" has been Published by IEEE HPCC 2025. Congratulations Xiaofu!
Our paper "Blockchain-Driven Distributed Edge Intelligence for Enhanced Internet-of-Vehicles" has been Published by IEEE IoTJ. Congratulations Xiaofu!
Our paper "BANN-TMGuard: Toward Touch-Movement-Based Screen Unlock Patterns via Blockchain-Enabled Artificial Neural Networks on IoT Devices" has been Published by IEEE IoTJ .
Our paper "DEMO: Towards A Novel Ultrasonic Side-channel Attack on Mobile Devices" has been published by ACM SIGCOMM 2024. Congratulations Yingli!
Our paper "Pitfalls of data masking techniques: Re-identification attacks" has been accepted by SecureComm 2024. Congratulations Brooke and Andreas!
Our paper "can-sleuth: Investigating and Evaluating Automotive Intrusion Detection Datasets" has been published by EICC 2024. Congratulations Brooke!
Our paper "UltraCommander: Ultrasonic Side Channel Attack via Browser Extensions" has been accepted by DSPP 2024. Congratulations Yingli!
We have two papers accepted by ISPEC 2024 . Congratulations Kanagaratnam and Rishikesh!
Our paper "can-fp: An attack-aware analysis of false alarms in automotive intrusion detection models" has been accepted by PST 2024. Congratulations Brooke!
Our paper "can-train-and-test: A curated CAN dataset for automotive intrusion detection" has been Published by Computers and Security . Congratulations Brooke!
Our paper "Detecting Post Editing of Multimedia Images using Transfer Learning and Fine Tuning" has been Published by ACM TOMM. Congratulations Simon and Malthe!
Our paper "Securing IoT Firmware Dispatch System With Blockchain" has been accepted by IEEE Blockchain 2023. Congratulations Vince and Wayne!
Our paper "Securing Offshore Installations Against Automatic Identification System Spoofing" has been accepted by IEEE Globecom 2023. Congratulations Grzegorz and Brooke!

We have two survey papers accepted by IEEE COMST ("Intrusion Detection in the Automotive Domain: A Comprehensive Review") and Expert Systems with Applications ("A Survey of Deep Learning-based Intrusion Detection in Automotive Application"). Congratulations Brooke!
Our paper "Towards Quantifying Cross-Domain Maximal Extractable Value for Blockchain Decentralisation" has been accepted by ICICS 2023. Congratulations Johan!
Our paper "NoSneaky: A Blockchain-based Execution Integrity Protection Scheme in Industry 4.0" has been published by IEEE Transactions on Industrial Informatics. Congratulations Wayne!
Our paper "No Free Wireless Charge: Covert Channels via Wireless Charging on Mobile Devices" has been accepted by IEEE DSN 2023. Congratulations Wayne!
Our paper "FolketID: A Decentralized Blockchain-based NemID Alternative against DDoS Attacks" has received the Best Paper Award from ProvSec 2023. Congratulations Wayne!
Our paper "Towards A Scalable and Privacy-Preserving Blockchain-based European Parking System" has been accepted by ICPADS 2022. Congratulations Jonathan!
Our paper "Towards Enhanced EEG-based Authentication with Motor Imagery Brain-Computer Interface" has been accepted by ACSAC 2022. Congratulations Bingkun!

Our paper "A Practical Blockchain-based Maintenance Record System for Better Aircraft Security" has been accepted by SciSec 2022, and received the Best Paper Award. Congratulations Wictor, Sille and Wayne!

Our three papers "IDS for CAN: A Practical Intrusion Detection System for CAN Bus Security", "Towards Artificial Neural Network Based Intrusion Detection with Enhanced Hyperparameter Tuning" and "TDL-IDS: Towards A Transfer Deep Learning based Intrusion Detection System" have been accepted by IEEE GLOBECOM 2022. Congratulations Brooke, Andrei and Xingguo!
Our paper "DevLeChain - An Open Blockchain Development Platform for Decentralized Applications" has been accepted by IEEE Blockchain 2022. Congratulations Wayne!
Our paper "Mosaic - A Blockchain Consensus Algorithm Based on Random Number Generation" has been accepted by IEEE Blockchain 2022. Congratulations Zhengzhong!
Our paper "Security Analysis in Satellite Communication based on Geostationary Orbit" has been accepted by PST 2022. Congratulations Jacob and Mikkel!
Our paper "Designing In-Air Hand Gesture-based User Authentication System via Convex Hull" has been accepted by PST 2022. Congratulations Yiming!
Our AirChain project will give a demo in IEEE ICBC 2022!
Our BlockCycle project has received the Honorary Mention Award for IEEE ComSoc Student Competition "Communications Technology Changing the World" 2021. Congratulations Wayne!
Our paper "Towards DTW-based Unlock Scheme using Handwritten Graphics on Smartphones" has been accepted by IEEE MSN 2021. Congratulations Li!
Our paper "BALSAPro: Towards A Security Protocol for Bluetooth Low Energy" has been accepted by IEEE MSN 2021. Congratulations Mohamad!
Our paper "My Data, My Control: A Secure Data Sharing and Access Scheme over Blockchain" has been accepted by JISA (Elsevier).
Our paper "NGS: Mitigating DDoS Attacks using SDN-based Network Gate Shield" has been accepted by IEEE GLOBECOM 2021. Congratulations Suhel!
Our paper "ActAnyware - Blockchain-based Software Licensing Scheme" has received the best paper award by BlockSys 2021. Congratulations Wayne!
Our paper "Mind the Amplification: Cracking Content Delivery Networks via DDoS Attacks" has been accepted by WASA 2021. Congratulations Zihao!
Our paper "Mind the Scraps: Attacking Blockchain based on Selfdestruct" has been accepted by ACISP 2021. Congratulations Wayne!
Our paper "NoPKI - A Point-to-Point Trusted Third Party Service based on Blockchain Consensus Algorithm" has received the Best Paper Award by FCS 2020. Congratulations Wayne!
Our SpaCCS paper has received the Best Student Paper Award by SpaCCS 2020. Congratulations Wayne!
Our paper "Towards Decentralized Bicycle Insurance System Based on Blockchain" has been accepted by ACM SAC 2021. Congratulations Wayne!
Our paper "ChainPKI - Towards EThash-based Decentralized PKI with Privacy Enhancement" has been accepted by
Our paper "I Can Think Like You! Towards Reaction Spoofing Attack on Brainwave-based Authentication" has been accepted by
Our paper "Evaluation of Anomaly-based Intrusion Detection with Combined Imbalance Correction and Feature Selection" has been accepted by NSS 2020.
Our paper "Towards Secure Open Banking Architecture: An Evaluation with OWASP" has been accepted by NSS 2019..
Our paper "CyberShip-IoT: A Dynamic and Adaptive SDN-Based Security Policy Enforcement Framework for Ships" has been accepted by Future Generation Computer Systems.
Our paper "CyberShip: An SDN-based Autonomic Attack Mitigation Framework for Ship Systems" has been accepted by SciSec 2018.
Our paper "Analyzing the Communication Security between Smartphones and IoT based on CORAS" has been accepted by NSS 2018.
